column4: hey, I have an UEFI setup by windows and I need to get grub working.  The usual reinstalling isn't working.  Any idea how to get this to work?
I have only a bootable USB drive at my disposal, and that's what I'm currently booting from.
I don't get it -- you only have a usb drive, and you're booting from it?
sorry, I have a working laptop, an ubuntu install that can't boot, and a windows install that requires UEFI which I disbled in my BIOS.
what happens when you try to boot it?
do you know what's on your mbr?
read UEFI up on wikipedia.  It's a hot-fixed mess
yea, I know, I have boxes booting linux, windows and OS X from the same disk.
what do I need to find out about it?
the characters in the upperl left of the screen right after the bios screen is telling
